mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, content, viewCount, regdate FROM board_cafe ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_cafe (num, writer, title, content, viewCount, regdate) VALUES(board_cafe_seq.NEXTVAL,#{writer},#{title},#{content},#{viewCount},SYSDATE)
